TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SqlMembershipProvider extends System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider

summary.span: Manages storage of membership information for an ASP.NET application in a SQL Server database.

span.span: Manages storage of membership information for an ASP.NET application in a SQL Server database.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別由和類別提供 ASP.NET 應用程式使用 SQL Server 資料庫的成員資格服務。This class is used by the and classes to provide membership services for an ASP.NET application using a SQL Server database. 您無法使用未搭配 SQL Server。You cannot use a without SQL Server. 當您的電腦有 SQL Server Express 安裝到預設執行個體名稱和使用者執行個體已啟用，物件將會建立一個稱為資料庫`aspnetdb`在應用程式的`App_Data`目錄第一次應用程式會執行。When your computer has SQL Server Express installed with the default instance name and user-instancing enabled, the object will create a database called `aspnetdb` in the application's `App_Data` directory the first time the application is run. 若要手動建立資料庫，執行`Aspnet_regsql.exe`可執行檔中找到`%systemroot%\Microsoft.NET\Framework\ versionNumber`資料夾，並指定`-A m`選項 (例如`aspnet_regsql.exe -A m`)。To manually create the database, run the `Aspnet_regsql.exe` executable found in the `%systemroot%\Microsoft.NET\Framework\ versionNumber` folder and specify the `-A m` option (for example `aspnet_regsql.exe -A m`). 建立的資料庫稱為 Aspnetdb。The database created is called Aspnetdb. 或者，執行`Aspnet_regsql.exe`提取該名 GUI 組態模式，並選擇設定所有的 ASP.NET 功能。Alternatively, run `Aspnet_regsql.exe` to pull up the GUI configuration mode and choose to configure all ASP.NET Features. 如果成員資格提供者的連接字串來使用整合式的安全性設定，ASP.NET 應用程式的處理序帳戶必須具有權限可以連線到 SQL Server 資料庫。If the membership provider is configured with a connection string that uses integrated security, the process account of the ASP.NET application must have rights to connect to the SQL Server database. Machine.config 檔，定義預設值名為執行個體`AspNetSqlMembershipProvider`連接至本機電腦上的預設 SQL Server Express 執行個體。The Machine.config file defines a default instance named `AspNetSqlMembershipProvider` that connects to the default SQL Server Express instance on the local machine. 如果您安裝 SQL Server Express 預設執行個體名稱，或者您可以在 Web.config 檔案中定義您自己的執行個體，ASP.NET 應用程式，您可以使用提供者的這個執行個體。You can use this instance of the provider if you installed SQL Server Express with the default instance name, or you can define your own instance in the Web.config file for your ASP.NET application. 如果您設定`passwordCompatMode`屬性、 應用程式可以使用的雜湊及加密的成員資格選項的 ASP.NET 4 中所加入。If you set the `passwordCompatMode` attribute to , the application can use the hashing and encryption membership options that were added in ASP.NET 4. 不過，如果`passwordCompatMode`屬性設為只雜湊及加密的成員資格選項，從 ASP.NET 2.0，ASP.NET 3.5，可以使用 ASP.NET 3.5 SP1。However, if the `passwordCompatMode` attribute is set to , only the hashing and encryption membership options from the ASP.NET 2.0, ASP.NET 3.5, and ASP.NET 3.5 SP1 can be used. 預設值是 。The default value is . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範設定為使用 ASP.NET 應用程式的 Web.config 檔案。The following code example shows the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application configured to use a . ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 正由群組使用者資訊。The is used by the to group user information. 來限定應用程式名稱的使用者資訊，您可以在單一資料庫中儲存多個應用程式的資訊而不重複的使用者名稱之間發生衝突。By qualifying user information with an application name, you can store information for multiple applications in a single database without running into conflicts between duplicate user names. 此外，多個 ASP.NET 應用程式時，可以藉由指定相同的值中使用相同的使用者資料庫屬性。Also, multiple ASP.NET applications can use the same user database by specifying the same value in the property. 屬性可以透過程式設計的方式，設定或它的 Web 應用程式組態檔中可以宣告方式設定`applicationName`屬性。The property can be set programmatically, or it can be set declaratively in the configuration file for the Web application with the `applicationName` attribute. 如果未指定值`applicationName`Web 應用程式組態檔中的屬性則使用應用程式所做的第一個要求的屬性值。If a value is not specified for the `applicationName` attribute in the configuration file for the Web application, then the property value for the first request made to the application is used. > [!CAUTION] > 因為所有由提供服務的要求會使用單一預設成員資格提供者執行個體物件，您可以有多個要求同時執行，而且嘗試設定屬性值。Because a single default membership provider instance is used for all of the requests served by an object, you can have multiple requests executing concurrently and attempting to set the property value. 屬性不是執行緒安全的多個寫入，且變更屬性值可能會導致非預期的行為，應用程式的多個使用者。The property is not thread safe for multiple writes, and changing the property value can result in unexpected behavior for multiple users of an application. 我們建議您避免撰寫程式碼以讓使用者能夠設定屬性除非必要，否則。We recommend that you avoid writing code to allow users to set the property unless you must. 應用程式的範例設定屬性可能需要為系統管理的應用程式管理的多個應用程式成員資格資料。An example of an application where setting the property may be required is an administrative application that manages membership data for multiple applications. 這類應用程式應該在單一使用者應用程式並不是 Web 應用程式。Such an application should be a single-user application and not a Web application. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範中的項目`system.web`的 ASP.NET 應用程式的 Web.config 檔案區段。The following code example shows the element in the `system.web` section of the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application. 它會指定應用程式的執行個體和設定至`MyApplication`。It specifies the application's instance and sets the to `MyApplication`. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫類別，以更新 ASP.NET 應用程式組態檔 (Web.config) 中指定的 SQL Server 資料庫中使用者的密碼。This method is called by the class to update the password for a user in the SQL Server database specified in the ASP.NET application's configuration file (Web.config). 密碼長度上限為 128 個字元。The maximum password length is 128 characters. 如果不正確的密碼提供給方法時，追蹤無效的密碼嘗試都會加一的內部計數器。If an incorrect password is supplied to the method, the internal counter that tracks invalid password attempts is incremented by one. 這會導致使用者正在鎖定且無法登入，直到鎖定狀態的呼叫，以清除方法。This can result in the user being locked out and unable to log on until the lock status is cleared by a call to the method. 如果提供正確的密碼，且使用者目前並不遭到鎖定，則內部計數器該追蹤無效的密碼和密碼解答嘗試重設為零。If the correct password is supplied and the user is not currently locked out, then the internal counters that track invalid password and password-answer attempts are reset to zero. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和屬性。For more information, see the and properties. 您可以呼叫方法，直接由第一次取得參考透過執行個體屬性類別。You can call the method directly by first obtaining a reference to the instance through the property of the class. 屬性會公開`defaultProvider`應用程式的 Web.config 檔案中指定。The property exposes the `defaultProvider` specified in the Web.config file for the application. 設定提供者不是預設提供者使用參考屬性。Configured providers that are not the default provider referenced using the property. 您也可以藉由變更使用者密碼方法。You can also change user passwords by using the method. 所有參數值會都修剪開頭和尾端空白。Leading and trailing spaces are trimmed from all parameter values. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會修改指定之使用者的密碼。The following code example modifies the password for the specified user. > [!NOTE] > 這個範例會使用屬性類別來呼叫指定為`defaultProvider`Web.config 檔案中。This example uses the property of the class to call the specified as the `defaultProvider` in the Web.config file. 如果您需要存取預設提供者，做為類型，您可以轉型屬性類別。If you need to access the default provider as the type , you can cast the property of the class. 若要存取其他設定提供者為特定的提供者類型、 您可以依其設定的名稱和存取這些屬性類別，並將參數轉換成特定的提供者類型。To access other configured providers as a specific provider type, you can access them by their configured name with the property of the class and cast them as the specific provider type. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫類別，以更新的密碼問題和解答的 ASP.NET 應用程式組態檔 (Web.config) 中指定 SQL Server 資料庫中的使用者。This method is called by the class to update the password question and answer for a user in the SQL Server database that is specified in the ASP.NET application's configuration file (Web.config). 使用中指定的格式來加密的密碼解答屬性。The password answer is encrypted using the format that is specified in the property. 需要密碼問題和解答，提供額外的安全性時擷取，或重設使用者的密碼。Requiring a password question and answer provides an additional layer of security when retrieving or resetting a user's password. 建立使用者名稱時，使用者可以提供問題和解答，稍後可以用來擷取或重設忘記的密碼。When creating a user name, a user can supply a question and answer that can later be used to retrieve or reset a forgotten password. 方法會更新的密碼問題和解答的成員資格使用者。The method updates the password question and answer for a membership user. 如果不正確的密碼提供給方法]、 [內部追蹤無效的密碼嘗試次數都會加一的計數器。If an incorrect password is supplied to the method, the internal counters that track invalid password attempts is incremented by one. 這會導致使用者正在鎖定且無法登入，直到鎖定狀態都會藉由呼叫方法。This can result in the user being locked out and unable to log on until the lock status is cleared by calling the method. 如果提供正確的密碼，且使用者目前並不遭到鎖定，則內部計數器該追蹤無效的密碼和密碼解答嘗試重設為零。If the correct password is supplied and the user is not currently locked out, then the internal counters that track invalid password and password-answer attempts are reset to zero. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和屬性。For more information, see the and properties. 密碼問題的最大長度為 256 個字元。The maximum length for the password question is 256 characters. 密碼解答的最大長度為 128 個字元。The maximum length for the password answer is 128 characters. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱、和。For more information, see , , and . 所有參數值會都修剪開頭和尾端空白。Leading and trailing spaces are trimmed from all parameter values. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會更新的密碼問題和解答的使用者。The following code example updates the password question and answer for a user. > [!NOTE] > 這個範例會使用屬性類別來呼叫指定為`defaultProvider`Web.config 檔案中。This example uses the property of the class to call the specified as the `defaultProvider` in the Web.config file. 如果您需要存取預設提供者，做為類型，您可以轉型屬性類別。If you need to access the default provider as the type , you can cast the property of the class. 若要存取其他設定提供者為特定的提供者類型、 您可以依其設定的名稱和存取這些屬性類別，並將參數轉換成特定的提供者類型。To access other configured providers as a specific provider type, you can access them by their configured name with the property of the class and cast them as the specific provider type. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫類別，以在 ASP.NET 應用程式組態檔中指定的 SQL Server 資料庫中建立新的使用者。This method is called by the class to create a new user in the SQL Server database specified in the ASP.NET application's configuration file. 會將新的使用者識別與已設定。New users are identified with the configured . 如果屬性設定為`true`，和`null`或空字串 ("") 指定`email`參數，建立使用者將會失敗。If the property is set to `true`, and `null` or an empty string ("") is specified for the `email` parameter, the user creation will fail. 建立使用者也會失敗，如果屬性設定為`true`和指定的值`email`參數已設定的資料庫中現有的使用者之電子郵件地址重複。The user creation will also fail if the property is set to `true` and the value specified for the `email` parameter is a duplicate of the email address for an existing user in the database for the configured . 使用者名稱的最大長度為 256 個字元。The maximum length for the user name is 256 characters. 電子郵件地址的最大長度為 256 個字元。The maximum length for the email address is 256 characters. 以純文字或之後雜湊或加密的密碼的最大長度為 128 個字元。The maximum length for the password in clear text or after it has been hashed or encrypted is 128 characters. 讓使用者建立失敗的其他條件：Other conditions that will cause user creation to fail: - `password`參數是`null`，或空字串修剪後的。The `password` parameter is `null`, or an empty string after trimming. - 長度`password`參數小於指定的值屬性。The length of the `password` parameter is less than the value specified in the property. - 中的非字母字元數`password`參數小於指定的值屬性。The number of non-alphabetic characters in the `password` parameter is less than the value specified in the property. - `password`參數未通過的規則運算式屬性。The `password` parameter does not pass the regular expression in the property. - 自訂密碼驗證程式碼取消使用者建立期間事件。Custom password-validation code canceled user creation during the event. - 屬性是`true`和`passwordAnswer`參數為`null`或空字串修剪後的。The property is `true` and the `passwordAnswer` parameter is either `null` or an empty string after trimming. - `passwordAnswer`參數為空字串。The `passwordAnswer` parameter is an empty string. - `passwordAnswer`參數長度超過 128 個字元。The `passwordAnswer` parameter is longer than 128 characters. - 屬性是`true`並且密碼問題是`null`或空字串修剪後的。The property is `true` and the password question is either `null` or an empty string after trimming. - `passwordQuestion`參數為空字串。The `passwordQuestion` parameter is an empty string. - `passwordQuestion`參數長度超過 256 個字元。The `passwordQuestion` parameter is longer than 256 characters. - `providerUserKey`參數設定為型別的物件以外。The `providerUserKey` parameter set to an object of a type other than . - remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供方法，會產生密碼，以指定的大小至少指定的非字母的字元數。The class provides a method, which generates a password of a specified size with at least the specified number of non-alphabetic characters. 方法呼叫方法類別來擷取至少 14 個字元長的隨機密碼。The method of the calls the method of the class to retrieve a random password that is at least 14 characters long. 如果屬性大於 14，傳回的密碼將會在指定的長度屬性。If the property is greater than 14, the password returned will be the length specified in the property. 您可以特別呼叫方法藉由參考類別直接從屬性類別。You can specifically call the method by referencing the class directly from the property of the class. 產生的密碼只能包含英數字元以及下列標點符號： `!@#$%^&*()_-+=[{]};:<>|./?`。The generated password only contains alphanumeric characters and the following punctuation marks: `!@#$%^&*()_-+=[{]};:<>|./?`. 沒有隱藏的或非可列印的控制字元會包含在產生的密碼。No hidden or non-printable control characters are included in the generated password. > [!NOTE] > 所建立的隨機密碼方法不保證傳遞規則運算式中的屬性。The random password created by the method is not guaranteed to pass the regular expression in the property. 不過，隨機密碼將會符合所建立的準則和屬性。However, the random password will meet the criteria established by the and properties. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會產生 10 個字元的隨機密碼。The following code example generates a random 10-character password. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫從 ASP.NET 應用程式組態檔 (Web.config) 中指定的 SQL Server 資料庫擷取使用者資訊的類別。This method is called by the class to retrieve user information from the SQL Server database specified in the ASP.NET application's configuration file (Web.config). 所傳回的結果受到`pageIndex`和`pageSize`參數。The results returned by are constrained by the `pageIndex` and `pageSize` parameters. `pageSize`參數識別的最大數目物件中傳回。The `pageSize` parameter identifies the maximum number of objects to return in the . `pageIndex`參數識別要傳回其中零識別的第一頁的結果的頁面。The `pageIndex` parameter identifies which page of results to return, where zero identifies the first page. `totalRecords`參數是`out`參數設為所設定的成員資格使用者總數`applicationName`。The `totalRecords` parameter is an `out` parameter that is set to the total number of membership users for the configured `applicationName`. 比方說，如果有設定 13 使用者`applicationName`，而`pageIndex`值為 1 以`pageSize`5，傳回會包含第 6 到傳回的第十個使用者。For example, if there are 13 users for the configured `applicationName`, and the `pageIndex` value was 1 with a `pageSize` of 5, the returned would contain the sixth through the tenth users returned. `totalRecords`參數會設定為 13。The `totalRecords` parameter would be set to 13. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例傳回一份使用者的使用者數目的計數資料頁面中目前在線上。The following code example returns a list of users in pages of data with a count of the number of users currently online. > [!NOTE] > 這個範例會使用類別來呼叫指定為`defaultProvider`Web.config 檔案中。This example uses the class to call the specified as the `defaultProvider` in the Web.config file. 如果您需要存取預設提供者，做為類型，您可以轉型屬性類別。If you need to access the default provider as the type , you can cast the property of the class. 若要存取其他設定提供者為特定的提供者類型、 您可以依其設定的名稱和存取這些屬性類別，並將參數轉換成特定的提供者類型。To access other configured providers as a specific provider type, you can access them by their configured name with the property of the class and cast them as the specific provider type. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫類別來擷取使用者的密碼，從 ASP.NET 應用程式組態檔 (Web.config) 中指定的 SQL Server 資料庫。This method is called by the class to retrieve the password for a user from the SQL Server database specified in the ASP.NET application's configuration file (Web.config). 如果不正確的密碼解答提供給方法時，追蹤無效的密碼解答嘗試都會加一的內部計數器。If an incorrect password answer is supplied to the method, the internal counter that tracks invalid password-answer attempts is incremented by one. 這會導致使用者正在鎖定且無法登入，直到鎖定狀態的呼叫，以清除方法。This can result in the user being locked out and unable to log on until the lock status is cleared by a call to the method. 如果提供正確的密碼解答，且使用者目前並不遭到鎖定，則會追蹤無效的密碼解答嘗試次數的內部計數器會重設為零。If the correct password answer is supplied and the user is not currently locked out, then the internal counter that tracks invalid password-answer attempts is reset to zero. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和屬性。For more information, see the and properties. 您可以呼叫方法，直接由第一次取得參考透過執行個體屬性類別。You can call the method directly by first obtaining a reference to the instance through the property of the class. 如果屬性設定為、方法無法擷取密碼。If the property is set to , the method cannot retrieve the password. 雜湊的密碼單向加密，而且無法解密。Hashed passwords are encrypted one-way and cannot be decrypted. 如果屬性設定為，和設`true`、提供者初始化時，會擲回。If the property is set to , and is set to `true`, a is thrown when the provider is initialized. 所有參數值會都修剪開頭和尾端空白。Leading and trailing spaces are trimmed from all parameter values. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會擷取指定的使用者名稱的密碼，並將它傳送給使用者的電子郵件訊息。The following code example retrieves the password for a specified user name and sends it to the user in an email message. > [!NOTE] > 不建議針對需要較高的安全性等級的網站傳回使用電子郵件以純文字密碼。Returning a password in clear text using email is not recommended for sites that require a high level of security. 高安全性的網站，我們建議您傳回密碼使用加密，例如 SSL。For high-security sites, we recommend that you return passwords using encryption, such as SSL. > [!NOTE] > 這個範例會呼叫指定為`defaultProvider`在 Web.config 檔案中使用類別。This sample calls the specified as the `defaultProvider` in the Web.config file by using the class. 如果您需要存取預設提供者，做為類型，您可以轉型屬性類別。If you need to access the default provider as the type , you can cast the property of the class. 若要存取其他設定提供者為特定的提供者類型、 您可以依其設定的名稱和存取這些屬性類別，並將參數轉換成特定的提供者類型。To access other configured providers as a specific provider type, you can access them by their configured name with the property of the class and cast them as the specific provider type. remarks.format: ## Remarks 可搭配為了防範不必要的來源的密碼或密碼解答的重複嘗試透過成員資格使用者的猜測。The works in conjunction with the to guard against an unwanted source guessing the password or password answer of a membership user through repeated attempts. 如果的無效密碼或提供成員資格使用者的密碼問題數目大於或等於值屬性的值所識別的分鐘數內屬性，則成員資格使用者藉由設定鎖定屬性`true`直到使用者才能解除鎖定與方法。If the number of invalid passwords or password questions supplied for a membership user is greater than or equal to the value of the property within the number of minutes identified by the value of the property, then the membership user is locked out by setting the property to `true` until the user is unlocked with the method. 如果之前提供有效的密碼，則到達值時，追蹤無效的密碼和密碼解答嘗試次數的計數器會重設為零。If a valid password is supplied before the value is reached, the counters that track the number of invalid password and password-answer attempts are reset to zero. 如果之前提供有效的密碼解答到達值時，只會追蹤無效的密碼解答嘗試次數的計數器會重設為零。If a valid password answer is supplied before the value is reached, only the counter that tracks the number of invalid password-answer attempts is reset to zero. 分別保留無效的密碼嘗試次數與無效的密碼解答嘗試計數。The keeps counts of invalid password attempts and invalid password-answer attempts separately. 無效的密碼嘗試只在遞增密碼嘗試計數器中的結果。Invalid password attempts result in only the password-attempt counter being incremented. 無效的密碼解答嘗試只在遞增密碼解答計數器中的結果。Invalid password-answer attempts result in only the password-answer counter being incremented. 屬性值會設定在應用程式組態中，使用`maxInvalidPasswordAttempts`組態區段的屬性。The property value is set in the application configuration using the `maxInvalidPasswordAttempts` attribute of the configuration section. 如果屬性設定為`false`，不會追蹤無效的密碼解答嘗試。If the property is set to `false`, invalid password-answer attempts are not tracked. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範中的項目`system.web`的 ASP.NET 應用程式的 Web.config 檔案區段。The following code example shows the element in the `system.web` section of the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application. 它會指定應用程式使用的執行個體並設定`maxInvalidPasswordAttempts`屬性設定為五個無效的嘗試次數和`passwordAttemptWindow`為 30 分鐘。It specifies that the application use an instance of the and sets the `maxInvalidPasswordAttempts` attribute to five invalid attempts and the `passwordAttemptWindow` to 30 minutes. ``` ```

value.span: 時間視窗中，以分鐘為單位，期間的連續失敗嘗試提供有效的密碼或密碼解答追蹤。

span.span: The time window, in minutes, during which consecutive failed attempts to provide a valid password or password answers are tracked.
The default is 10 minutes.

value.span: 如果目前的失敗的嘗試和上一次的失敗的嘗試之間的間隔超過屬性的設定，每個失敗的嘗試都會被視為就像是第一次嘗試失敗。

span.span: If the interval between the current failed attempt and the last failed attempt is greater than the property setting, each failed attempt is treated as if it were the first failed attempt.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可搭配內容，協助防範不必要的來源，破解的密碼或密碼解答，透過成員資格使用者的重複次數。The property works in conjunction with the property to help guard against an unwanted source guessing the password or the password answer of a membership user through repeated attempts. 當使用者嘗試登入、 變更其密碼，或重設其密碼時，請指定的時間間隔內允許只有特定數目的連續嘗試。When users are attempting to log in, change their password, or reset their password, only a certain number of consecutive attempts are allowed within a specified time window. 所指定的時間間隔長度屬性，其可識別允許無效嘗試之間的分鐘數。The length of the time window is specified by the property, which identifies the number of minutes allowed between invalid attempts. 如果連續嘗試失敗次數，可讓使用者重設他或她密碼等於中儲存的值屬性，以及時間後經過無效上次小於指定的分鐘數屬性，則成員資格使用者已鎖定設定屬性`true`。If the number of consecutive failed attempts that a user makes to reset his or her password equals the value stored in the property, and the time elapsed since the last invalid attempt is less than the number of minutes specified for the property, then the membership user is locked out by setting the property to `true`. 使用者可以藉由呼叫解除鎖定方法。The user can be unlocked by calling the method. 如果目前的失敗的嘗試和上一次的失敗的嘗試之間的間隔超過視為第一個屬性的設定，目前的嘗試無效。If the interval between the current failed attempt and the last failed attempt is greater than the property setting, the current invalid attempt is counted as the first. 如果之前允許的無效嘗試次數上限為止，請提供有效的密碼解答，無效的密碼解答嘗試計數是設定為零。If a valid password answer is supplied before the maximum number of allowed invalid attempts is reached, the count of invalid password-answer attempts is set to zero. 如果允許無效的最大數目之前提供有效的密碼嘗試次數達到時，不正確的密碼嘗試次數的計數和無效的密碼解答嘗試計數設定為零。If a valid password is supplied before the maximum number of allowed invalid attempts is reached, the count of invalid password attempts and the count of invalid password-answer attempts are set to zero. 分別保留無效的密碼嘗試次數和無效的密碼解答嘗試計數。The keeps count of invalid password attempts and invalid password-answer attempts separately. 無效的密碼嘗試只在遞增密碼嘗試計數器中的結果。Invalid password attempts result in only the password-attempt counter being incremented. 無效的密碼解答嘗試只在遞增密碼解答計數器中的結果。Invalid password-answer attempts result in only the password-answer counter being incremented. 屬性值會設定在應用程式組態中，使用`passwordAttemptWindow`組態區段的屬性。The property value is set in the application configuration using the `passwordAttemptWindow` attribute of the configuration section. 如果屬性設定為`false`，不會追蹤無效的密碼解答嘗試。If the property is set to `false`, invalid password-answer attempts are not tracked. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範中的項目`system.web`的 ASP.NET 應用程式的 Web.config 檔案區段。The following code example shows the element in the `system.web` section of the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application. 它會指定應用程式使用的執行個體並設定`maxInvalidPasswordAttempts`屬性設定為五個無效的嘗試次數和`passwordAttemptWindow`為 30 分鐘。It specifies that the application use an instance of the and sets the `maxInvalidPasswordAttempts` attribute to five invalid attempts and the `passwordAttemptWindow` to 30 minutes. ``` ```

summary.span: Gets a value indicating the format for storing passwords in the SQL Server membership database.

span.span: Gets a value indicating the format for storing passwords in the SQL Server membership database.

value.span: 其中一個 值，指出在 SQL Server 資料庫中用來儲存密碼之格式。

span.span: One of the values, indicating the format for storing passwords in the SQL Server database.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用`Hashed`僅`Clear`和`Encrypted`並未受到保護。Use `Hashed` only, `Clear` and `Encrypted` are not secure. `Hashed` 密碼已雜湊使用單向雜湊演算法和隨機產生的 salt 值儲存在資料庫中。`Hashed` passwords are hashed using a one-way hash algorithm and a randomly generated salt value when stored in the database. 驗證密碼時，它會將雜湊驗證的資料庫中的 salt 值。When a password is validated, it is hashed with the salt value in the database for verification. 無法擷取雜湊的密碼。Hashed passwords cannot be retrieved. `Encrypted` 密碼不安全的因為的缺口都可顯示您的資料庫內容，也可以公開加密金鑰。`Encrypted` passwords are not considered safe, as a breach that reveals your database contents can also expose the encryption key. 這表示可以解密加密的密碼，並且公開。This means your encrypted passwords could be decrypted and exposed. ASP.NET 應用程式的 Web.config 檔案的區段中指定值。The value is specified in the section of the Web.config file for the ASP.NET application. `Encrypted` 和`Hashed`密碼會加密，或您的組態中的項目中所提供的資訊為基礎的預設雜湊。`Encrypted` and `Hashed` passwords are encrypted or hashed by default based on information supplied in the element in your configuration. 請注意，如果您指定的值`3DES`如`validation`屬性，或如果未不指定任何值，雜湊的密碼將會使用雜湊演算法。Note that if you specify a value of `3DES` for the `validation` attribute, or if no value is specified, hashed passwords will be hashed using the algorithm. 可以使用來定義自訂的雜湊演算法`hashAlgorithmType`屬性[元素 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述） 的成員資格](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049)組態項目。A custom hash algorithm can be defined using the `hashAlgorithmType` attribute of the [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049) configuration element. 如果您選擇加密時，預設的密碼加密使用 AES。If you choose encryption, default password encryption uses AES. 您可以變更加密演算法設定`decryption`組態項目的屬性。You can change the encryption algorithm by setting the `decryption` attribute of the configuration element. 如果您要加密的密碼，您必須提供明確的值為`decryptionKey`項目中的屬性。If you are encrypting passwords, you must provide an explicit value for the `decryptionKey` attribute in the element. 預設值`AutoGenerate`如`decryptionKey`使用加密密碼與 ASP.NET 成員資格時，不支援屬性。The default value of `AutoGenerate` for the `decryptionKey` attribute is not supported when using encrypted passwords with ASP.NET Membership. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範中的項目`system.web`的 ASP.NET 應用程式的 Web.config 檔案區段。The following code example shows the element in the `system.web` section of the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application. 它會指定應用程式的執行個體，並將其密碼格式設定為`Hashed`。It specifies the application's instance and sets its password format to `Hashed`. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會取得用來評估密碼複雜度的規則運算式物件。The property gets the regular expression used to evaluate password complexity for the object. 屬性設定在應用程式組態中，使用`passwordStrengthRegularExpression`屬性[元素 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述） 的成員資格](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049)組態項目。The property is set in the application configuration using the `passwordStrengthRegularExpression` attribute of the [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049) configuration element. ## Examples 下列範例所示[元素 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述） 的成員資格](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049)中的組態項目`system.web`應用程式的 Web.config 檔案區段。The following example shows the [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049) configuration element in the `system.web` section of the application's Web.config file. 它會指定應用程式使用的執行個體類別提供成員資格服務與集`passwordStrengthRegularExpression`屬性驗證的密碼是否符合下列條件的規則運算式：It specifies that the application use an instance of the class to provide membership services, and sets the `passwordStrengthRegularExpression` attribute to a regular expression that validates that the password meets the following criteria: - 為至少需要七個字元。Is at least seven characters. - 包含至少一個數字。Contains at least one digit. - 包含至少一個特殊的 （非英數） 字元。Contains at least one special (non-alphanumeric) character. 如果密碼不符合這些準則，成員資格提供者不接受的密碼。If the password does not meet these criteria, the password is not accepted by the membership provider. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 需要密碼問題和解答，提供額外的安全性時擷取，或重設使用者的密碼。Requiring a password question and answer provides an additional layer of security when retrieving or resetting a user's password. 建立使用者名稱時，使用者可以提供問題和解答，稍後可以用來擷取或重設忘記的密碼。When creating a user name, a user can supply a question and answer that can later be used to retrieve or reset a forgotten password. 如果屬性和屬性都`false`，值屬性無關。If the property and the property are both `false`, the value of the property is irrelevant. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 與 。For more information, see and . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範中的項目`system.web`的 ASP.NET 應用程式的 Web.config 檔案區段。The following code example shows the element in the `system.web` section of the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application. 它會指定應用程式的執行個體，並將它設定為需要有密碼解答的密碼重設或重建。It specifies the application's instance and configures it to require a password answer for password reset or retrieval. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫重設為新的 ASP.NET 應用程式組態檔 (Web.config) 中指定的 SQL Server 資料庫中使用者的密碼類別隨機產生的值。This method is called by the class to reset the password for a user in the SQL Server database specified in the ASP.NET application's configuration file (Web.config) to a new, randomly generated value. 傳回新的密碼。The new password is returned. > [!NOTE] > 所建立的隨機密碼方法不保證傳遞規則運算式中的屬性。The random password created by the method is not guaranteed to pass the regular expression in the property. 不過，隨機密碼將會符合所建立的準則和屬性。However, the random password will meet the criteria established by the and properties. 方法是大多數常用時屬性設定為`Hashed`。The method is most commonly used when the property is set to `Hashed`. 如果使用者忘記的密碼雜湊，則無法擷取密碼。If a user forgets a password that is hashed, the password cannot be retrieved. 不過，提供者可以將密碼重設為自動產生新密碼如果使用者提供正確的密碼解答。However, the provider can reset the password to a new, automatically generated password if the user supplies the correct password answer. 如果不正確的密碼解答提供給方法時，追蹤無效的密碼嘗試都會加一的內部計數器。If an incorrect password answer is supplied to the method, the internal counter that tracks invalid password attempts is incremented by one. 這會導致使用者正在鎖定且無法登入，直到鎖定狀態的呼叫，以清除方法。This can result in the user being locked out and unable to log on until the lock status is cleared by a call to the method. 如果提供正確的密碼解答，且使用者目前並不遭到鎖定，則會追蹤無效的密碼解答嘗試次數的內部計數器會重設為零。If the correct password answer is supplied and the user is not currently locked out, then the internal counter that tracks invalid password-answer attempts is reset to zero. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和屬性。For more information, see the and properties. 您可以呼叫方法，直接由第一次取得參考的執行個體屬性類別。You can call the method directly by first obtaining a reference to the instance from remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫驗證 ASP.NET 應用程式組態檔 (Web.config) 中指定的 SQL Server 資料庫中使用者的使用者資訊的類別。This method is called by the class to validate user information for a user in the SQL Server database specified in the ASP.NET application's configuration file (Web.config). 成功驗證使用者，也會為目前的日期和時間在資料庫中的更新的上次活動日期和最後一個登入日期值。When a user is successfully validated, the last activity date and last sign-in date values are updated to the current date and time in the database. 如果不正確的密碼提供給方法時，追蹤無效的密碼嘗試都會加一的內部計數器。If an incorrect password is supplied to the method, the internal counter that tracks invalid password attempts is incremented by one. 這會導致使用者正在鎖定且無法登入，直到鎖定狀態的呼叫，以清除方法。This can result in the user being locked out and unable to log on until the lock status is cleared by a call to the method. 如果提供正確的密碼，且使用者目前並不遭到鎖定，則內部計數器該追蹤無效的密碼和密碼解答嘗試重設為零。If the correct password is supplied and the user is not currently locked out, then the internal counters that track invalid password and password-answer attempts are reset to zero. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱和屬性。For more information, see the and properties. 所有參數值會都修剪開頭和尾端空白。Leading and trailing spaces are trimmed from all parameter values. ##
